'''Phantom Frames''' is a tie-in DLC to [[The Garden Awakens]], released under the [[Expect the unexpected]] campaign, as both an [[add-on]] for {{BE}} and a [[data pack]] for {{JE}}.
[[File:Phantom Frames Add-On Key art.webp|thumb|300px|Key art for the DLC.]]

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
* [[File:Phantom Frames Book.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Phantom Frames Add-On{{only|bedrock|short=1}}
** Appears in the [[inventory]] upon starting the [[world]] or activating the add-on.
** Gives an explanation of the add-on's features.

=== Mobs ===
* [[File:Phantom Frames Add-On Merchant (shutter closed) render.png|50px]] [[File:Phantom Frames Add-On Merchant (acacia) render.png|50px]] Merchant{{only|bedrock|short=1}}
** Spawns during night.
** Can be traded with, offering only magical paintings.
==== Entities ====
* [[File:Painting PFA.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Magical Painting
** Requires 3x3 wall (similar to a [[painting]]) to be {{Control|placed}}.
** Allows the player to travel to a random location across the [[Overworld]], setting up a permanent link between the two portals.
** Have a chance to show a mysterious, white-eyed figure appear for a short time before disappearing.
